hmh.android.font

Class ArabicUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • hmh.android.font.ArabicUtilities

  • public class ArabicUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main class that is responsible for Reshaping Arabic Sentences and Text Utilities Class to make it easier to deal with Arabic Reshaper Class Wrapper for Arabic Reshaper Class
    Author:
    Amr Gawish
